TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AttributeCollection extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供物件模型 (Object Model) 的存取權給 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項項目的開頭標記中宣告的所有屬性。

span.span: Provides object-model access to all attributes declared in the opening tag of an ASP.NET server control element.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合中的個別項目傳回做為其值的物件。Individual items in the collection return a object as their value. 如果沒有屬性中沒有項目集合，集合傳回`null`。If there are no attribute items in the collection, the collection returns `null`. HTML 伺服器控制項上的屬性都是以程式設計方式透過該層會繼承的所有 HTML 伺服器控制項的屬性。Attributes on an HTML server control are programmatically available through the property, which is inherited by all HTML server controls. ASP.NET 會為這些控制項的屬性公開 HTML 伺服器控制項的屬性。ASP.NET exposes attributes of HTML server controls as properties of those controls. 您可以將屬性加入至 Web 伺服器控制項透過該層會繼承的所有 Web 伺服器控制項的屬性。You can add attributes to a Web server control through the property, which is inherited by all Web server controls. Web 伺服器控制項的屬性集合中的屬性一定是未對應到該控制項的控制項的強型別屬性。The attributes in the attributes collection for a Web server control do not necessarily correspond to the control's strongly typed properties for that control. ## Examples 下列範例會建立新物件，名為`myAttributeCollection`，然後檢查 [頁面是否已張貼上一步]。The following example creates a new object that is named `myAttributeCollection`, and then checks whether the page has been posted back. 如果沒有，程式碼會將兩個屬性加入集合中。If it has not, the code adds two attributes to the collection. 接著，取得集合中的屬性數目並逐一查看集合中，寫入至頁面的每個屬性的索引鍵。It then gets the number of attributes in the collection and iterates through the collection, writing the key to each attribute to the page. 如果頁面回傳，程式碼會取得新的屬性數目，並逐一查看集合的索引鍵和每個屬性的值寫入頁面。If the page is a postback, the code gets the new number of attributes and iterates through the collection, writing the key and value of each attribute to the page. [!code-csharp[AttributeCollection_AttributeCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AttributeCollection_AttributeCollection/CS/attributecollection_attributecollection.cs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[AttributeCollection_AttributeCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AttributeCollection_AttributeCollection/VB/attributecollection_attributecollection.vb.aspx#1)]

param.span: 物件，包含伺服器控制項之開頭標記中的屬性索引鍵和其值。

span.span: An object that contains the attribute keys and their values from the opening tag of the server control.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用建立類別的執行個體建構函式將它命名為`myAttributeCollection`。The following example shows how to use the constructor to create an instance of the class named it `myAttributeCollection`. 程式碼會將控制項傳遞做為參數引數的屬性。The code passes the control's property as a parameter argument. [!code-csharp[AttributeCollection_AttributeCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AttributeCollection_AttributeCollection/CS/attributecollection_attributecollection.cs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[AttributeCollection_AttributeCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AttributeCollection_AttributeCollection/VB/attributecollection_attributecollection.vb.aspx#2)]

span.span: The attribute name.
The attribute value.

summary.span: 將屬性加入至伺服器控制項的 物件。

span.span: Adds an attribute to a server control's object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在字串`value`參數包含連字號 (&) 字元自動進行編碼。If the string in the `value` parameter contains an ampersand (&), the character is automatically encoded. 所產生的 HTML 表示法是 「&"。The resulting HTML representation is "&". ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法以程式設計方式將屬性新增至 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項物件。The following example shows how to use the method to programmatically add an attribute to an ASP.NET server control object. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic AttributeCollection.Add Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AttributeCollection.Add Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic AttributeCollection.Add Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AttributeCollection.Add Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AddAttributes(class System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer) cil managed

param.name: writer
param.span: 執行個體，會將屬性寫入 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項的開頭標記中。

span.span: An instance that writes the attribute to the opening tag of an ASP.NET server control.

summary.span: 將屬性從 類別加入負責將屬性當做標記呈現的 物件。

span.span: Adds attributes from the class to the object that is responsible for rendering the attributes as markup.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會複製所有伺服器控制項的屬性物件，以便可以呈現的下一個呼叫方法。This method copies all the server control's attributes to an object so that they can be rendered by the next call to the method. 例如包含在其他控制項的控制項和，您可能可以藉由直接呈現所包含的控制項來改善效能。For controls that are contained in other controls such as and , you can potentially improve performance by rendering the contained controls directly. 直接呈現會較快，因為容器控制項需要您將所有子控制項屬性都複製到容器控制項，並複製之後將它們轉譯，轉譯透過容器控制項。Rendering directly can be faster than rendering through the container control because container controls require that you copy all the child control attributes to the container control and render them after they are copied. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何加入新的屬性，名為的伺服器控制項`myButton`並伺服器控制項，名為`myTextBox`。The following example shows how to add new attributes to a server control named `myButton` and a server control named `myTextBox`. 然後將這些屬性新增至自訂物件會寫入輸出資料流的那些屬性的每個這些控制項。It then adds those attributes to a custom object that will write those attributes to an output stream for each of those controls. [!code-csharp[AttributeCollection_Item#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AttributeCollection_Item/CS/attributecollection_item.cs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[AttributeCollection_Item#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AttributeCollection_Item/VB/attributecollection_item.vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Clear() cil managed

summary.span: 從伺服器控制項的 物件中移除所有屬性。

span.span: Removes all attributes from a server control's object.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例示範如何以程式設計方式移除 HTML 伺服器控制項中的所有屬性物件。The following example shows how to programmatically remove all attributes from an HTML server control's object. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic AttributeCollection.Clear Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AttributeCollection.Clear Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic AttributeCollection.Clear Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AttributeCollection.Clear Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Gets the number of attributes in the object.
The number of items in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來包含頁面控制項上寫入屬性的數目。The following example shows how to use the property to write the number of attributes on a control to the containing page. [!code-csharp[AttributeCollection_AttributeCollection#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AttributeCollection_AttributeCollection/CS/attributecollection_attributecollection.cs.aspx#4)] [!code-vb[AttributeCollection_AttributeCollection#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AttributeCollection_AttributeCollection/VB/attributecollection_attributecollection.vb.aspx#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CssStyle As CssStyleCollection
public: property System::Web::UI::CssStyleCollection ^ CssStyle { System::Web::UI::CssStyleCollection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得目前 物件所屬的 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項樣式的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of styles for the ASP.NET server control to which the current object belongs.

value.span: 集合，包含目前伺服器控制項的樣式。

span.span: A collection that contains the styles for the current server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 任何樣式宣告特定的 HTML 伺服器控制項加入至剖析包含 ASP.NET Web 網頁時的物件。Any style declared for a particular HTML server control is added to the object when the containing ASP.NET Web page is parsed. 您可以使用這個屬性來新增、 移除及逐一查看宣告伺服器控制項的樣式。You can use this property to add, remove, and iterate through the styles declared for the server control. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何以程式設計方式將 CSS 樣式值，加入伺服器控制項的物件。The following example shows how to add a CSS style value programmatically to a server control's object. 當按下按鈕的背景色彩名為的伺服器控制項`TextBox1`設定為在選取的項目伺服器控制項，名為`DropDownList1`。When a button is clicked, the background color of a server control named `TextBox1` is set to the selected item in a server control named `DropDownList1`. [!code-csharp[AttributeCollection_CssStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AttributeCollection_CssStyle/CS/attributecollection_cssstyle.cs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[AttributeCollection_CssStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AttributeCollection_CssStyle/VB/attributecollection_cssstyle.vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool Equals(object o) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Equals (o As Object) As Boolean

param.name: o
param.span: 要與這個執行個體比較的物件執行個體。

span.span: The object instance to compare with this instance.

summary.span: 判斷 物件目前的執行個體是否等於指定的物件。

span.span: Determines whether the current instance of the object is equal to the specified object.

returns.span: 如果 參數中包含的物件等於 物件目前的執行個體則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the object that is contained in the parameter is equal to the current instance of ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 相等比較的物件，它們必須符合下列準則：For the compared objects to be equal, they must meet the following criteria: - 中包含的物件`o`參數必須是物件。The object that is contained in the `o` parameter must be an object. - 這兩個集合必須包含相同數目的項目。Both collections must contain the same number of items. - 這兩個集合中每個項目的索引鍵的值必須符合。The key value of each entry in both collections must match. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。This method is primarily used by control developers.

Public Overrides Function GetHashCode () As Integer

span.span: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，以判斷雜湊程式碼，這個物件。Use the method to determine the hash code for this object.

span.span: The location of the attribute in the collection.

summary.span: 取得或設定伺服器控制項的指定屬性值。

span.span: Gets or sets a specified attribute value for a server control.
The attribute value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以將屬性新增至或擷取從 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項使用這個屬性。You can add an attribute to or retrieve one from an ASP.NET server control that uses this property. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定動態 HTML`onblur`屬性來執行的 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 命令Web 伺服器控制項失去焦點。The following example shows how to set a dynamic HTML `onblur` attribute to run an ECMAScript (JavaScript) command when a Web server control loses focus. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic AttributeCollection Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AttributeCollection Example 2/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic AttributeCollection Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AttributeCollection Example 2/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Keys As ICollection
public: property System::Collections::ICollection ^ Keys { System::Collections::ICollection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得伺服器控制項的 物件中的所有屬性的索引鍵集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of keys to all attributes in the server control's object.
The collection of keys.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性包含中的所有索引鍵ASP.NET 伺服器控制項，是否您已加入它們以程式設計方式用方法，或以宣告方式。This property contains all the keys that are in the of an ASP.NET server control, whether you have added them programmatically with the method, or declaratively. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何逐一查看的屬性物件伺服器控制項。The following example shows how to iterate through the property of the object for an server control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic AttributeCollection.Keys Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AttributeCollection.Keys Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic AttributeCollection.Keys Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AttributeCollection.Keys Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Remove(string key) cil managed

span.span: The name of the attribute to remove.

summary.span: 從伺服器控制項的 物件移除屬性。

span.span: Removes an attribute from a server control's object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果物件不包含具有指定屬性`key`，集合會保持不變。If the object does not contain an attribute that has the specified `key`, the collection remains unchanged. 不會有例外狀況擲回。No exception is thrown. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何以程式設計方式移除 HTML 伺服器控制項的顯示屬性物件。The following example shows how to programmatically remove an attribute from an HTML server control's object. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic AttributeCollection.Remove Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AttributeCollection.Remove Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic AttributeCollection.Remove Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AttributeCollection.Remove Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Render(class System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer) cil managed

param.name: writer
param.span: 執行個體，會將屬性集合寫入目前的輸出資料流。

span.span: An instance that writes the attribute collection to the current output stream.

summary.span: 將屬性集合寫入為集合所屬控制項所指定的 輸出資料流。

span.span: Writes the collection of attributes to the specified output stream for the control to which the collection belongs.

remarks.format: ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何繼承自類別來建立名為自訂控制項`AttribRender`會覆寫方法。The first code example shows how to inherit from the class to create a custom control named `AttribRender` that overrides the method. 第二個程式碼範例示範如何在 ASP.NET 網頁中使用自訂控制項。The second code example shows how to use the custom control in an ASP.NET Web page. 下列範例示範如何建立名為自訂控制項`AttribRender`會覆寫方法類別，而不需呼叫基底類別的方法。The following example shows how to create a custom control named `AttribRender` that overrides the method of the class without calling the method of the base class. 相反地，`AttribRender`叫用方法。Instead, `AttribRender` invokes the method. [!code-csharp[AttributeCollection.Render_Sample1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AttributeCollection.Render_Sample1/CS/attributecollection_render.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AttributeCollection.Render_Sample1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AttributeCollection.Render_Sample1/VB/attributecollection_render.vb#1)] 下列範例示範如何使用`AttribRender`在網頁中的自訂控制項。The following example shows how to use the `AttribRender` custom control in a Web page. 它假設自訂控制項的程式碼檔案是應用程式的 App_Code 資料夾中。It assumes that the code file for the custom control is in the App_Code folder for the application. [!code-aspx-csharp[AttributeCollection.Render_Sample1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AttributeCollection.Render_Sample1/CS/attributecollection_rendercs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[AttributeCollection.Render_Sample1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AttributeCollection.Render_Sample1/VB/attributecollection_rendervb.aspx#2)]
